title: Our EPIC Threadripper 2 2950X Build Is Alive!
description: AMD's Threadripper 2 was just launched only a few days ago with the 2950X and 2990WX and we decided to put together an EPIC build for it.  It includes the 2950X, 128GB of memory, Cooler Master's Wraithripper cooler and much more!  Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  NZXT H500i (Sponsor):    Fractal R6:   X399 Zenith:   Corsair Vengeance RGB White:   Samsung 960 PRO:   Samsung 970 EVO:   BeQuiet Dark Power 1000W:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by the companies mentioned. This video is sponsored by NZXT. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #threadripper2 #2950x #hardwarecanucks
